BackgroundSection.header_subtitle: From Business & IT to practical, technical solutions
BackgroundSection.header_description: I design and build tools that remove friction from real-world processes: translating business needs into clean, reliable software that people actually use.
BackgroundSection.profile_paragraph1: After graduating in Business & IT at the University of Twente, I found my groove: building and implementing smart, pragmatic tools that actually improve how companies work. Less chaos. Fewer manual steps. More breathing room for the people who keep the business running.
BackgroundSection.profile_paragraph2: I have a habit of picking apart messy processes, figuring out where the friction lives, and replacing it with something clean, automated, and reliable.
BackgroundSection.focus_paragraph1: In the landscape of Business & IT, two worlds often clash: the strategic voice of business and the technical dialect of engineering. I sit squarely in the middle.
BackgroundSection.focus_paragraph2: I translate business constraints into clear technical requirements, and technical limitations back into realistic business decisions. When off-the-shelf tools fall short, I design and build the missing pieces myself: data pipelines, simulations, workflow systems, and integration tooling.
BackgroundSection.operator_focus_value: Process automation, manufacturing data, and hiring / matching tooling.
BackgroundSection.operator_currently_value: KiwiConnect (matching platform), IFC / production tooling, internal dashboards.
BackgroundSection.operator_tooling_value: Next.js · TypeScript · Python · PostgreSQL Arch Linux · Tauri · Exact Online / API work.

ServicesSection.service1_description: Turn messy, informal workflows into clear process maps that reveal bottlenecks, handovers, and automation opportunities.
ServicesSection.service2_description: Design and build lightweight tools that fit your team: from small utilities to full internal apps that replace spreadsheets.
ServicesSection.service3_description: Connect the tools you already use so data flows automatically instead of being copied around by hand.
ServicesSection.service4_description: Structure your data so it can actually be used: consistent models, clean exports, and reports that answer real questions.
ServicesSection.service5_description: Validate ideas quickly with focused prototypes, so you know what's worth investing in before committing to a big build.
ServicesSection.service6_description: Use simulations to explore different scenarios, spot constraints, and make better decisions about planning and capacity.
